extendedInfo.description: The NAEA National Convention is an annual event providing substantive professional development services that include the advancement of knowledge in all sessions, events, and activities for the purpose of improving visual arts instruction. The four-day convention is the world's largest art education event and features over 1,000 participatory workshops, panels, and seminars; keynote addresses by world-acclaimed educators, artists, researchers, and scholars; networking opportunities with colleagues; and nearly 200 exhibitor booths displaying art textbooks, high-tech software, prints, slides, curriculum materials, equipment, programs, and the latest studio and art history media all available for examination and review.

reviews.title: Cool App scary persmissions...
reviews.comment: Seems like a nice app BUT some serious permissions:  * access to our camera to take photos without our confirmation?  * see our contact\'s info and phone state and ability to save all our private or sensitive data from our devices?  * \"Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on your tablet, including the frequency with which you\'ve called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific individuals.\" -this seems like they have the ability to read what we\'re talking about with other presenters who are using the app.  * send emails/messages on our behalf without our knowledge?    I would be comforted to know more about these permission and if any of our private data is transferred to their servers and stored any amount of time after the conference has ended in addition to encryption and security info...
reviews.author: Scott McMaster
